scripts.start:debug: DEBUG=APP:* DEBUG_HIDE_DATE=true DEBUG_COLORS=true concurrently "npm run start:dev-frontend" "npm run start:dev-backend"
scripts.start:debug-only: DEBUG=$NAMESPACE DEBUG_HIDE_DATE=true DEBUG_COLORS=true concurrently "npm run start:dev-frontend" "npm run start:dev-backend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd ./backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
